listView.title: Clothing
list: 4-8 onesies (wide head openings and loose legs)
4-8 undershirts (snaps at neck or wide head openings, snaps under crotch)
4-7 socks or booties (shoes are unnecessary until baby walks)
1-3 hats (broad-brimmed for summer baby, soft cap that covers ears for winter baby)
Bunting bag or fleece suit for winter baby (not too bulky for wearing in carseat)

listView.title: Nursery
list: Firm, flat mattress fit snugly in crib (less than two fingers should fit between mattress and crib)

listView.title: Diapering
list: Changing table or cushioned changing pad for low dresser or bureau, with safety strap or railing
Cloth Diapers (see store for recommended quantities)
Disposable Diapers (try a few brands to see what you prefer)

listView.title: Bath
list: 2-4 soft towels or hooded baby towels
Soft washcloths (use a different color or pattern than your diaper washcloths!)

listView.title: Feeding
list: 10-16 bottles and nipples, both 4- and 8- ounce (if fed strictly by the bottle, baby will go through about 10 in the 4-ounce size per day)
Milk storage bags (if you plan to breastfeed)
Nursing pads (if you plan to breastfeed)
Nipple cream (if you plan to breastfeed)
Nursing pillow (if you plan to breastfeed)
Bottle warmer (cuts down on nighttime trips to and from the kitchen)
Bottle sterilizer (if your dishwasher doesnâ€™t have one)

listView.title: Health
list: Baby nail clippers or blunt scissors
